mapper.insert: insert into uOrder ( orderId, delivAdd, goodsPay, delivFee, totalPay, payWay, ordetStatus, orderTM) values (#{orderId}, #{delivAdd}, #{goodsPay}, #{delivFee}, #{totalPay}, #{payWay}, '주문완료', now())
insert into orderGoods (orderNum, pNum, pVolumn) values (#{orderNum}, #{pNum}, #{pVolumn})
mapper.select: select count(*) from uOrder where orderId = #{uId}
select num, delivAdd, goodsPay, delivFee, totalPay, payWay, ordetStatus, orderTM from uOrder where orderId = #{uId} order by num desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select pNum, pVolumn, pName from orderGoods inner join goodsTbl on orderGoods.pNum = goodsTbl.num where orderNum = #{orderNum}
